card.name: Bob
card.description: {{KW:CHARGE}}. {{KW:MAGIC}}: Add a copy of every different {{TRIBE:TEMMIE|1}} in your dustpile to your hand. (from lowest to highest {{COST}}, except {{CARD:200|1}})
